item.title: Merge Sort using WEBGL
item.description: This is a (perhaps overkill) 3D WEBGL visualization of Merge Sort using the WEBGL rendering mode. Launch this sketch is a new window (recommended) Launch the p5.js editor Controls - ENTER = play sorting animation - LEFT_ARROW = step backwards - RIGHT_ARROW = step forwards - SCROLL_UP = zoom in - SCROLL_DOWN = zoom out
